Title: Requires air quality monitoring of certain major mass transportation projects that involve an excavation operation within N.Y. city
Summary: Requires air quality monitoring of certain major mass transportation projects that involve an excavation operation within a city having a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง19-0322, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring air quality monitoring for certain major mass transportation projects
